Container.Overview: Running Boinc? Get some Gridcoins from your Boinc work! This docker contains Gridcoin Wallet with GUI running on Ubuntu. You can access the wallet via VNC and NoVNC. Check the project page for more info about Gridcoin
Container.Description:
Running Boinc? Get some Gridcoins from your Boinc work! This docker contains Gridcoin Wallet with GUI running on Ubuntu. You can access the wallet via VNC and NoVNC. Check the project page for more info about Gridcoin
You can install separate BOINC container to use with this. Specify BOINC DATA DIR if you are going to solo crunch, with pool crunching it is not needed
